name: Paris
description: The capital city of France, known for its art, fashion, and culture.

name: New York City
description: A major American city known for its iconic skyline, Broadway, and diverse culture.

name: Cape Town
description: A city in South Africa known for its stunning beaches, mountains, and history.

name: Sydney
description: The largest city in Australia, famous for its harbor, beaches, and landmarks like the Sydney Opera House.

name: Rome
description: The capital city of Italy, known for its nearly 3,000 years of globally influential art, architecture, and culture.

name: Dubai
description: A futuristic city in the United Arab Emirates known for its luxurious shopping, ultramodern architecture, and nightlife scene.

name: London
description: The capital city of England and the United Kingdom, known for its history, culture, and landmarks like Big Ben and the British Museum.
